explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the theatre, specifying that it represents the entrance of the sacred forest with tombs and statues of the Kings of Colchis. This fits well with the definition of Category 11, which is about stage description or play location.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente l'entrée de la forêt sacrée : on y voit les tombeaux et les statues des Rois de la Colchide.
